content.thinking: I need to analyze this PDF document and classify it properly. Let me extract the text first and then follow the classification workflow. **TEXT EXTRACTION:** From the image, I can see this is a Colombian "Cédula de Extranjería" (Foreign ID Card). The document shows: - "REPÚBLICA DE COLOMBIA" - "COL Cédula de Extranjería" - "MIGRANTE No. 7908085" - "APELLIDOS: CATALDO" - "NOMBRES: MONICA" - "NACIONALIDAD: ITA" - "FECHA DE NACIMIENTO: 1975/03/29" - "SEXO: F" - "RH: O+" - "EXPEDICIÓN: 2024/01/17" - "VENCE: 2024/11/22" There's also a signature, photo, fingerprint, and barcode at the bottom. **PRIORITY CHECKS:** - Not BLANK - there is meaningful content - Not LINK_ONLY - this is not primarily URLs/links **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION:** This is issued by the Colombian government (República de Colombia) for personal identification of foreign nationals. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS:** This is clearly a personal identification document - it's a "Cédula de Extranjería" which is an official Colombian ID card for foreign residents/migrants. It contains: - Individual biographical data (name, birth date, nationality, blood type, gender) - Individual photo - Signature area - Official government issuance - Security elements (barcode, fingerprint) **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION:** This fits perfectly into CECRL: - It's an official personal identification document - Contains individual biographical data (birth date, nationality, blood type, gender) - Has individual photo, signature, fingerprint references - Government-issued personal ID number with individual name - Has security elements (barcode, official seals) The document confirms its official status as a government-issued identification for a foreign resident, specifically Monica Cataldo, an Italian national residing in Colombia.
